sentences.en: Anl ■ - jade is a serpentine jade of the lizardite type.
sentences.cn: 安绿玉 属于利蛇纹石型的蛇纹石玉.

sentences.en: Difference property serpentine had been contrasted and obtained some significant results.
sentences.cn: 对不同性质的蛇纹石作了对比试验,得出了一些有意义的结论.

sentences.en: Install the serpentine drive belt and tighten to obtain the specified tension.
sentences.cn: 安装蛇形驱动带,拧紧到规定的张力.

sentences.en: Nearby, along the Serpentine, children happily fed ducks which competed for water space with splashing bathers.
sentences.cn: 附近, 沿着曲折蜿蜒的水池, 孩子们兴高采烈地向池里的鸭子投食,那些鸭子同凫水的游泳者们竞争着水面.

sentences.en: Olivine has been completely altered to serpentine, talc, and amphibole in the bore - hole examined in detail.
sentences.cn: 钻芯详细检查的结果,橄榄石全部蚀变为蛇纹石 、 滑石及角闪石.

sentences.en: One part of the Serpentine is kept for swimmers.
sentences.cn: 蜿蜒河的一段划为游泳区.

sentences.en: Remove serpentine drive belt, refer to Group Cooling.
sentences.cn: 拆下蛇型驱动皮带, 请参阅单元7-冷却.

sentences.en: Serpentine often contains some asbestos , and should be used with caution .
sentences.cn: 因为蛇纹石往往包含了一些石棉，收集时应谨慎。

sentences.en: The acid leaching kinetics of serpentine was researched.
sentences.cn: 研究了微波作用下蛇纹石的硫酸浸出动力学.

sentences.en: The method is presented for preparation metasilicate pentahydrate from residue after extracting magnesium from serpentine ore.
sentences.cn: 以蛇纹石提镁残渣为原料,采用常压蒸馏法直接合成了六配位有机硅化物.

sentences.en: The semi - solid feedstock of A 356 aluminum alloy was prepared through a serpentine pouring channel.
sentences.cn: 采用蛇形管浇注法制备了半固态A356铝合金浆料.

sentences.en: the serpentine course of the river
This piece of serpentine for making seals is too expensive for me to afford.
sentences.cn: 这块寿山石的章料太贵重了,我根本买不起.

sentences.en: Tin ore, iron ore, copper, gold , serpentine, granite, artificial stones processing, wood products marketing.
sentences.cn: 锡矿 、 铁矿 、 铜矿 、 铅锌矿 、 蛇纹石 、 花岗岩 、 人造宝石加工 、 竹木制品购销.

sentences.en: Tremolite laths and serpentine minerals are present in places.
sentences.cn: 有的地方出现透闪石板条及蛇纹石.

words.tran_cn: 蜿蜒的；阴险的；弯弯曲曲的

trans.tran_cn: 像蛇般蜷曲的，蜿蜒的，阴险的，弯弯曲曲的
